casebody.data:
May 27, 1968.

No. -.

Shiffman v. Selective Service Local Board No. 5 et al. Melvin L. Wulf for applicant. Solicitor General Griswold for respondents in opposition.

C. A. 2d Cir. Application for writ of injunction or stay, presented to Mr. Justice Harlan, and by him referred to the Court, denied.

(See concurring memorandum of Mr. Justice Stewart and dissent of Mr. Justice Douglas below.)
